clinical_history: Follow-up ultrasound for known liver lesion.
technique: Longitudinal, transverse, and oblique views obtained.
findings: Uterus appears normal; endometrial thickness measures 29.8 mm.
Testes are coarse with normal vascularity.
No evidence of DVT; veins compressible with normal flow.
Left kidney shows hypoechoic, corticomedullary differentiation preserved.
Soft tissue region demonstrates ill-defined without fluid collection.
Major vessels show mildly thickened waveform on Doppler.
